1370: Geile moved to Corte gracht.B.8 after marriage.
Got married to Wellinus at age 19 in 1370.
Gave birth to Woutersoet in 1370 at age 19.
1371: Gave birth to Folpertus in 1371 at age 20.
1372: Gave birth to Trame in 1372 at age 21.
1374: Gave birth to Gherelm in 1374 at age 23.
1376: Gave birth to Martin in 1376 at age 25.
1377: Gave birth to Brandekijn in 1377 at age 26.
Lost son Martin when Martin was 2 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Cecilia in 1378 at age 27.
1379: Gave birth to Lelien in 1379 at age 28.
Lost daughter Trame when Trame was 8 years old.
1391: Lost daughter Lelien when Lelien was 13 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1393: Lost son Folpertus when Folpertus was 23 years old.
